original_title: Great Battles of WWII: Midway, Kursk, and Crete
overview: Using authentic color and black & white footage captured from the battles this explains the events, circumstances, and results of three of the most important battles of WWII -- the battles of Midway, Kursk, and Crete.
title: Great Battles of WWII: Midway, Kursk, and Crete
